tags: Maintenance Services for Building, Source Water and Wastewater System(including storm and sanitary sewer),Including Watts Valve Beds, Booster Pump, and related Equipment
full_summary:
=====================================

**Target Summary Statement**
-----------------------------

The Government of Canada invites proposals for a request for proposal (RFP) to acquire back flow preventers for the Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) Central Experimental Farm located in Ottawa.

**Request Details**
---------------------

*   **Reference Number:** PW-22-01011311
*   **Solicitation Number:** 01B46-22-043
*   **Publication Date:** 2022-10-27
*   **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-11-10 14:00:00
*   **Contracting Entity Name:** Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Ontario (except NCR)
*   **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (except NCR)

**Scope of Work**
------------------

The objective of this RFP is to ensure compliance of back flow preventers with all applicable codes. All devices are located within the Central Experimental Farm, Ottawa.

**Invitation and Submittal**
---------------------------

Tenders for the project should be addressed to the attention of the Contract Officer, Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada. The bidders are required to contact the Contract Officer to inquire about any discrepancies or concerns regarding the project throughout the tender process. The AAFC Contract Officer is responsible for negotiating, awarding, and managing the resulting Contract.

**Important Contacts**
----------------------

*   Contract Officer: Jacques Toussaint
    *   Email: jacques.toussaint@canada.ca
    *   Phone: 
 
    Infrastructure Branch
    Corporate Management Branch
    Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
    1341 Baseline Road
    Ottawa
    Ontario
    K1A 0C5

**Procedure for Obtaining the RFP Document**
-------------------------------------------

To obtain the RFP document and any addenda, please follow the instructions below: 
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/27/6717f0c3f5b9724b057b3d5c6b18186a/demande_de_proposition_01b46-22-043.pdf

Tenderers may submit an application by email to the contact identified above. Tenderers will be evaluated based on their ability to meet the requirements outlined in the RFP document. Only those who submit a complete tender will be considered.

**Evaluation Criteria**
-----------------------

The RFP will be evaluated based
